deskripsi: Mengukur kemampuan membaca dan memahami teks berbahasa Inggris.
materi: Termasuk pemahaman teks, kosa kata, inferensi, dan ide pokok.

contoh_soal.pertanyaan: What is the main idea of the paragraph?
contoh_soal.pembahasan: Main idea refers to the central thought the paragraph is trying to convey.
